items.value:
The cart is controlled using the bottom panel, I think you'll figure it out ;) 
In order for the second character to run, just click on the point to which he should come 
Along the way, you need to collect various items to replenish your stamina and ammunition, maybe you will find something else useful 
Also collect round pieces on the stumps - these are fruits, they will not help you in the current race, but will allow you to make improvements that will strengthen you forever

Three creatures stole magic items from wizards. The Magicians are furious and they start chasing. The heroes need to escape to a safe place where they can hide. But is there a safe place? 
Each time before death, one of the stolen magic balls is triggered, which teleports the characters to the starting point of the race, thereby preventing the moment of death
